comments.en:
Unlike its big brother, the PagePro 1100, the 1100L is strictly a Windows GDI printer. It is unlikely that there will ever be Linux drivers for the PagePro 1100L.

Perhaps one can get it to work with the "pbmtozjs" driver, in its source code "Minolta" is mentioned. Please post on the Minolta forum on this site if you make the printer working this way.
